name: Hyperdeath
description:
Content warning: Visually remixed atrocities from the Internet.

You are the Object.
You freed yourself from the Subject.
The Subject needs to reincorporate you in the Symbolic Order.
You wish to escape the Simulation.
You pray for Hyperdeath.
Run.

An arcade game from the third order of reality. Expect 12-25 minutes according to procedure.

FEATURING

*5 levels of arcade indoctrination
*Ruthless symbolic orders
*Key concepts from Jean Baudrillard
*Analogic glitch processed video feed for your entertainment
*An experience orbiting around Tron's Lightcycles, No Thing and Pac-Man
*Original soundtrack by Un Regard Froid

W - Look forward
S - Look backward
A - Turn Left
R - Turn Right
ESC - Pause/Exit

Music by Un Regard Froid. Simulation (Soundtrack for Hyperdeath) is the final part of a trilogy initiated by Accélération and followed by Conspiration. Digital files available here or on Bandcamp: 
https://unregardfroid.bandcamp.com/album/simulation-soundtrack-for-hyperdeath

Car le sujet reflète bien, dans son malheur, dans mon miroir, le principe du mal, mais l'objet, lui, se veut pire et revendique le pire. Il témoigne d'une négativité plus radicale, à savoir que si tout finalement désobéit à l'ordre symbolique, c'est que tout a été détourné à l'origine.
Il faut être respectueux de l'inhumain.
-Jean Baudrillard, Les Stratégies fatales-
